title: Maluku F.C.
text:
Maluku FC (or Maluku Football Club) is an <a href="Indonesia">Indonesian</a> professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> club founded on 27 January 2021 and headquartered in <a href="Ambon%2C%20Maluku">Ambon</a>, <a href="Maluku%20%28province%29">Maluku</a> province.
History.
Maluku FC was founded on 27 January 2021, with an aim of promoting football in <a href="Maluku%20%28province%29">Maluku</a>, which has long been absent from its relevant representative.
On 25 September 2021, Maluku FC made league match debut in a 7–1 won against <a href="Binatama%20Bupolo%20F.C.">Binatama Bupolo</a> at the Kompi A Yonif 733/Raider Waiheru field, the achievement of 3 points at the same time led the club to top the provisional standings of Group B <a href="2021%20Liga%203%20Maluku">Liga 3 Maluku</a>.
On 12 October 2021, <a href="2021%20Liga%203%20Maluku">2021 Liga 3 Maluku</a> has been held and Maluku FC has become the champion to represent the province at the national level, not only being a regional champion, Maluku FC has been undefeated in the struggle in the league zone since the competition was held on September 23, 2021. In the final match, they win against <a href="Gemba%20F.C.">Gemba</a> with a score 1–0.
Stadium.
Maluku FC uses the Mandala Remaja Stadium in Ambon for their home matches.
